tool_description:
Comprehensive api about the prices of diamonds decided by 10 categories including carat, cut, color, clarity, ect... 

Based on Diamonds Prices2022.csv
name: Diamond-API
title: Diamond-API

api_list.name: Paginate
api_list.description: Get data based on a specific page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://diamond-api.p.rapidapi.com/3f4las/diamondapi?_page=2&_limit=10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diamond-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }
